Description.Text: Holiday Inn New York Hotel near John F Kennedy Airport is conveniently located within the premises of John F Kennedy Airport in Jamaica, New York. Lusciously decorated and furnished hotel suites, fine restaurant, ideal meeting settings and leisure facilities contribute to the fame and recognition of Holiday Inn New York John F Kennedy Airport. Meeting facilities at Holiday Inn New York Hotel John F Kennedy Airport feature extensive reserved hotel space, equipment rental, working areas in guestrooms and several complimentary business services.

• Shea Stadium • US Tennis Center, Flushing Meadows • Madison Square Garden • Rockaway Beach • Belmont Race Track • Gateway National Park • Coney Island Amusement Park • Manhattan Shopping District • Madison Square Garden • World Financial Center

Luxurious hotel accommodation at the Holiday Inn New York Hotel John F Kennedy Airport includes 360 elegantly appointed guestrooms and suites. Hotel guestrooms and suites are categorized as double and single bedrooms. Business guests at Holiday Inn New York Hotel John F Kennedy Airport are offered the choice of reserving the Executive Level suites, which feature additional guest amenities and complimentary hotel services.

Holiday Inn New York Hotel John F Kennedy Airport offers complimentary parking facilities, hotel on-site indoor and outdoor pool, Fitness Facility, Business Center, hotel concierge services and relaxing sauna. That’s not all; nearby golf courses, tennis courts and shopping districts provide additional recreational opportunities for hotel guests at Holiday Inn New York Hotel John F Kennedy Airport. The 360 guest rooms on 12 floors all offer alarm clock, cable TV, coffee maker, phone with data port, electronic door locks, voicemail, in-room movies, video games, free newspaper, and work desk with lamp.

Claudine’s Restaurant at Holiday Inn New York Hotel John F Kennedy Airport features an eclectic mix of traditional and international cuisine, while overlooking a beautiful Japanese garden. Le Bistro offers dinner and cocktails in its sports themed bar and restaurant. Holiday Inn New York Hotel John F Kennedy Airport also features Le Bistro Lounge for late evening relaxation.
